imdb.plot outline: On the eve of the full-scale outbreak of the Anti-Japanese War in 1937, under the leadership of Zhang Ping, a underground Communist worker under the leadership of the Communist Party's underground workers, the "Salvation Council" of Blue Water's anti-Japanese organization formulated a plan to steal the national treasure "White Jade Carving Dragonfly" that is about to flow overseas. Due to the mysterious killing of Lin Hai, the highest leader of the Salvation Council, the plan failed. Therefore, the chief investigator of the Lanshui Police Department, Ke Yang, and Zhang Ping were involved in the investigation of the case of Lin Hai being killed. The mutual exclusion of the two people from the beginning became a good brother of birth and death. At the same time, Ke Yang met Lin Hai, the sister of Lin Hai who was a member of the Salvation Association during the detection process, and they both fell in love. After the three people jointly experienced the confusing detection, Linxi was betrayed by a traitor, and Zhang Ping was captured by the national army and other thrilling events, Ke Yang gradually accepted the communist concept and anti-Japanese ideology. In the end, Ke Yang found out the murderer, but because of the corruption of the Nationalist government, the real vicious is still at large, Zhang Ping is also a heroic sacrifice. When Zhang Ping's death gave Ke's annoying touch, he finally realized that only the Communist Party could save China, and he and Lin Xi did not hesitate to join the revolutionary anti-Japanese torrent.
imdb.title: Out of the fog
